about_the_game:
Dive into an amazing world of fantasy and adventure with our game ! Test your memory and concentration as you explore a jungle full of cute and funny animals ... and a lot of secrets !

In this casual and fun challenge, you'll need to find matching cards and connect the pairs. With its randomly generated levels and engaging gameplay, this game is the perfect way to unwind and sharpen your skills.

Whether you're a fan of light-hearted fun or a thrilling mental test, this game can give you hours of amazing entertainment. Try it now and experience an awesome card-matching adventure in the wild !

YOU CAN EASILY PLAY FOR HOURS AND HAVE A LOT OF FUN
WITH THIS NEW GAME !

Immerse yourself in the new and amazing adventure in the depths of the jungle,

where you can train your memory !

- Complete more than 240 levels

- Each time the levels are randomly generated !

- Collect unique cards

- Unlock achievements

- and much more in this epic adventure !

You can complete the levels in a timely manner, but YOU choose how to play. Will you challenge yourself and beat your previous record, or simply have fun and relaxing - it's up to you !

Amaze yourself with your skills you never knew existed !

~ HOW TO PLAY ~

Pair the cards to remove them from the field.

Remove all cards to finish the level.

If you are fast enought, you will mark a new highscore. Improve while having fun !

On the easiest difficulty - Easy difficulty - the cards must be paired only by their images.

Complete the levels on all difficulties : easy, medium, hard, ultra hard !

Then comes the ultimate challenge - the Almost impossible difficulty !

COME AND SHOW YOUR SKILLS !

~ REVIEWS ~

~ LEGENDS SAY ~

Legends say ... in ancient times the spies trained their memory by watching a box with objects, then the box closes. Little by little they were able to point the position and the direction of enormous amount of objects !

After their special training they - legends say - were capable to memorize whole page of important document after only seeing it for a few seconds !
detailed_description:
RECOMMENDED FOR YOU !

     


About the Game

Dive into an amazing world of fantasy and adventure with our game ! Test your memory and concentration as you explore a jungle full of cute and funny animals ... and a lot of secrets !

In this casual and fun challenge, you'll need to find matching cards and connect the pairs. With its randomly generated levels and engaging gameplay, this game is the perfect way to unwind and sharpen your skills.

Whether you're a fan of light-hearted fun or a thrilling mental test, this game can give you hours of amazing entertainment. Try it now and experience an awesome card-matching adventure in the wild !

YOU CAN EASILY PLAY FOR HOURS AND HAVE A LOT OF FUN
WITH THIS NEW GAME !

Immerse yourself in the new and amazing adventure in the depths of the jungle,

where you can train your memory !

- Complete more than 240 levels

- Each time the levels are randomly generated !

- Collect unique cards

- Unlock achievements

- and much more in this epic adventure !

You can complete the levels in a timely manner, but YOU choose how to play. Will you challenge yourself and beat your previous record, or simply have fun and relaxing - it's up to you !

Amaze yourself with your skills you never knew existed !

~ HOW TO PLAY ~

Pair the cards to remove them from the field.

Remove all cards to finish the level.

If you are fast enought, you will mark a new highscore. Improve while having fun !

On the easiest difficulty - Easy difficulty - the cards must be paired only by their images.

Complete the levels on all difficulties : easy, medium, hard, ultra hard !

Then comes the ultimate challenge - the Almost impossible difficulty !

COME AND SHOW YOUR SKILLS !

~ REVIEWS ~

~ LEGENDS SAY ~

Legends say ... in ancient times the spies trained their memory by watching a box with objects, then the box closes. Little by little they were able to point the position and the direction of enormous amount of objects !

After their special training they - legends say - were capable to memorize whole page of important document after only seeing it for a few seconds !

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics card with DirectX 9
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

movies.name: Memory Adventures in the Jungle Gameplay - 3

name: Memory Adventures in the Jungle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits, Windows 11 64-bits
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics card with DirectX 9
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“When I first started Memory Adventures in the Jungle, I expected a simple matching game with gradually more cards. An easy straightforward experience. However, it quickly became more challenging and required real effort to achieve a decent score. The progression from simple to complex was well paced and kept me angaged. The visuals are clean and clear and my kids loved the adorable animals characters ...”
The Starving Writer

“With its cute animal art and challenging gameplay, Memory Adventures in the Jungle is a fun and addictive memory game that will keep you coming back for more.”
Rangort Review

“Memory Adventures in the Jungle takes the classic memory game to the next level with tough challenges and beautiful graphics. It’s perfect for those looking to test their memory and reflexes.”
Virtual Vault
short_description: More than 240 randomly generated levels ! You can easily play for hours and have a lot of fun with this new game! Immerse yourself in the new and amazing adventure in the depths of the jungle, where you can train your memory !
